attributes.review:
FROZEN

                             Written by

                            Jennifer Lee

                                             Final Shooting Draft
                                                          9/23/13

   OPEN ON: ICE.

   We're underwater looking up at it. A saw cuts through,
   heading right for us.

   EXT. SNOW-CAPPED MOUNTAINS -- DUSK

   ICE HARVESTERS, dressed in traditional Sami clothing, score a
   frozen lake. They SING.

                   "The Frozen Heart (Ice Worker's Song)"

                            ICE HARVESTERS
                  BORN OF COLD AND WINTER AIR
                  AND MOUNTAIN RAIN COMBINING,
                  THIS ICY FORCE BOTH FOUL AND FAIR
                  HAS A FROZEN HEART WORTH MINING.

   The men drag giant ice blocks through channels of water.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  CUT THROUGH THE HEART, COLD AND CLEAR.
                  STRIKE FOR LOVE AND STRIKE FOR FEAR.

                  SEE THE BEAUTY SHARP AND SHEER.
                  SPLIT THE ICE APART!
                  AND BREAK THE FROZEN HEART.
                  Hup! Ho! Watch your step! Let it go!

   A young Sami boy, KRISTOFF (8), and his reindeer calf, SVEN,
   share a carrot as they try to keep up with the men.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  Hup! Ho! Watch your step! Let it go!

   Young Kristoff struggles to get a block of ice out of the
   water. He fails, ends up soaked. Sven licks his wet cheek.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  BEAUTIFUL! POWERFUL! DANGEROUS! COLD!
                  ICE HAS A MAGIC CAN'T BE CONTROLLED.

   A sharp ice floe overtakes the workers, threateningly. They
   fight it back.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  STRONGER THAN ONE, STRONGER THAN TEN
                  STRONGER THAN A HUNDRED MEN!

   Massive fjord horses drag heavy ice plows.
                                                                2
FROZEN - J. Lee
ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  BORN OF COLD AND WINTER AIR
                  AND MOUNTAIN RAIN COMBINING

   The sun sets. Lanterns are lit.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  THIS ICY FORCE BOTH FOUL AND FAIR
                  HAS A FROZEN HEART WORTH MINING.
                  CUT THROUGH THE HEART, COLD AND CLEAR.

   In the dark, Kristoff and Sven finally manage to get a single
   block of ice out of the water.

                            ICE HARVESTERS (CONT'D)
                  STRIKE FOR LOVE AND STRIKE FOR FEAR.
                  THERE'S BEAUTY AND THERE'S DANGER HERE.
                  SPLIT THE ICE APART!
                  BEWARE THE FROZEN HEART.

   The workers pile onto the giant horse-drawn ice sled as it
   pulls away.

   Left behind, Kristoff and Sven push their ice block onto a
   dinky little sled then head off.

   We sweep up from them to the Northern Lights filling the
   sky...then move across the mountains...beneath the
   snowline...and descend upon...

   EXT. THE KINGDOM OF ARENDELLE -- NIGHT

   A humble castle, built of wood, nestled in a deep fjord.

   INT. CASTLE, NURSERY -- NIGHT

   ELSA (8) sleeps in her bed. Her little sister ANNA (5) pops
   up beside her.

                            YOUNG ANNA
                  Elsa. Psst. Elsa! Psst.

   Elsa doesn't stir. Anna sits on Elsa and bounces.

                            YOUNG ANNA (CONT'D)
                  Wake up. Wake up. Wake up.

                            YOUNG ELSA
                      (grumbling)
                  Anna, go back to sleep.

   Anna rolls onto her back and spreads all her weight on Elsa.
                                                              3
FROZEN - J. Lee

                            YOUNG ANNA
                      (drama queen-ish)
                  I just can't. The sky's awake, so
                  I'm awake, so we have to play.

                            YOUNG ELSA
                  ...Go play by yourself.

   Elsa shoves Anna off the bed.

   Anna lands butt to floor, sighs, defeated. But then she gets
   an idea. She hops back on the bed and lifts one of Elsa's
   eyelids.

                            YOUNG ANNA
                      (mischievously)
                  Do you want to build a snowman?

   Elsa's eyes both pop open. She smiles.

   INT. CASTLE STAIRCASE -- NIGHT

   Anna, now wearing snow boots, pulls Elsa by the hand.

                            YOUNG ANNA
                  Come on, come on, come on, come on.

   Elsa tries to shush her, but Anna's too excited.

   INT. BALLROOM -- NIGHT

   The girls sneak into the ballroom. Elsa shuts the door.

                            YOUNG ANNA
                  Do the magic! Do the magic!

   Elsa laughs and waves her hands together. Snowflakes suddenly
   burst forth and dance between her palms, forming a snowball.
   Elsa throws the snowball high into the air. Snow bursts out
   and flurries around the room. Anna dances about, catching
   flakes in her palms and mouth.

                            YOUNG ANNA (CONT'D)
                  This is amazing!

                            YOUNG ELSA
                  Watch this!

   Elsa stomps her little slippered foot and a layer of ice
   suddenly coats the floor, forming a giant ice rink. Anna
   slides off, laughing.
                                                              4
FROZEN - J. Lee

attributes.review: First of all this app is horrible and I got spammed pictures and videos of the crusty orange peel known as Donald Trumps Only Fans account🤢🤢🤮🤮 I kept getting notifications of STAY HOME and WEAR MASKS Umm excuse me? I have a right to get a haircut when I please 🤬🤬😡😡😠Uhhh there’s this thing called Freedom Donald!!!!!! I DEMAND TO SPEAK TO YOUR MANAGER!!! It scares me that DINGBATS 🧚🏿‍♀️🧞‍♀️😐👿🤡 Are believing the fake news spread on this app!!!! 👽👽👽👽👽 CORONAVIRUS IS FAKEE white people are immune to it because ObViOuSlY they are the superior race. After all not like light skin is a genetic mutation coming from darker skin tones cough* cough* Africa or anything. I Will not wear a masks when I go out to buy my 27th pack of cigarettes of the day because this is all FAKE NEWSS!! 👻👻☠️💀👽😈👾👾👾 To make matters worse I was in the middle of performing a C Section on my old gal betsy when I kept getting text from whichever dingbats are running 🏃‍♀️ 🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️🏃‍♀️ this app. Unfortunately Betsy didn’t make it she died giving birth to her 10000 lb baby May she Rest In Peace’s. I tried calling customer service but I was SHOCKED I tell you when LOVELYPEACHES 🤮🤢🤢🤢 Answered the phone She kept saying how her Dora and peppa pig all have beef and I’m life what’s the problem with having meat?🤢🤢 That woman makes my stomach churn more than riding an angry bull I’ll tell you that much 🤬🤬🤢🤢🤮🤮I was walking my microwave when there was nonstop spam of fake news 🤬😾😾👺I tried deleting the app but it simply wouldn’t let me and Everytime I tried all it showed was a wet Cheeto trying to explain why MY BASIC HUMAN RIGHTS are being taken away because he did a oopsie and got into the science kit👺🤡🤡🤡😻😾👄👄👄 Oh to see without my eyes👁👅👁 I will not STAND FOR LIBERAL NAZIS TRYING TO RULE THIS COUNTRY WE KARENS MUST BAN TOGETHER TO SAVE THE FUTURE GENERATION FROM THIS CORRUPTION 🧠👣👤👃💂🏼‍♂️👛👓🎩👒🦊 But remember you GOT TO KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR SELENER👀

attributes.review: So i download the app looking for a president who wasn’t a rapist/racist/homophobe and was sadly unable to find anyone or anything of the sort.It also took way too long to download this walmart dumpster app. Especially now that i am trying to delete it, it is taking double the amount of time it took to load. I cannot believe how looking for a president that doesn’t take away an app for minors and young adults is so CHALLENGING. I have never felt this stressed and ANGRY in my life and cannot believe i even thought we could have a better president then our lovely bae obama. How disappointing😢miss you obama❤️❤️ sending my love to obama and his family. xoxo. To the obese greasy blob of Trumpie i hope you don’t receive any votes i mean, you were the one who said we should stick needles with cleaning product to rid us of covid-19. Also Mr.homophobe how’s Barron and Melania doing??
attributes.title: absolutely terrible😚🥰❤️

attributes.review: UGH THIS APP IS THE WORST! I downloaded the app and it took 286 days to load😒..... which is honestly super unrealistic...... THEN a death treat came on my screen and they stole all my information! Next thing you know a amazon package comes to my house and it’s filled with mice saying “Cheeto faceeeee cheeeto faceeee”🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟🦗🦟.... anyways I am now living with the mice we have a very tight bond ! 💕✨🦋 I respect them and they respect me😌........ I encourage everyone to respect our elderly mice💕..... After this this weird talking orange with ramen hair came on my screen..... weird right??? Anyway😑 that’s is for today’s tea.... sorry but it was a little steamy today 😌☕️☀️🦋💕✨
attributes.title: Respect our elderly mice 💕🦋✨

mm kay so basicallyyyy i downloaded the app and everything was fine enjoying this so called “app” after a 9 WEEKS yeah 9 weeks i was like great now i get to support this very amazing president (not sarcasm😉😉) after about 15 min my phone shut down and i was bout to watch my show i was like ummm anyway chileee and then my mom called told me to make a plate and i was like ok ill just wait it out went to turn on the tv nothing tried to turn my other 300 tvs NOTHING at this point im OUTRAGED and then it clicked my phone turned on went to rate it a 1 star and 2 min goes by and there’s marshmallows hard ash very large nachos being thrown at my house.. tvs turn on BLASTING the national anthem get a knock on my door and the president over here is tryna fight im like ok b*tch lets go i tackle his big a*s through the window we both fall i grab the pool noodle near by and start hitting his a*s and the rest was history anyway yall save the hassle and enjoy a nice meal 

sincerely: Hannah, hannah baker live and in stereo😚✌🏼
